name: The Only One Girl 1stQ
description:
{ First Quarter } is the short version of what will be a much longer visual novel, "The Only One Girl". This version is fully functional and hopefully will give you a good taste. It is due for one final update later to extend it a little and add more extras. 

Synopsis

"Sera-Abigail Clementine has just transferred to Riley Parks Academy, a prestigious formerly all-boys school that just went co-ed--and she's the only girl registered!

Completely aware of the anime-esque scenario she's been thrust into, our heroine just knows her time here has the potential to be ripe with various tropes and cliches... like in a visual novel!

With a charming cheeseball always hitting on her, a super shy loner who always sleeps during class, an unamused "hall monitor", and the obligatory foreigner who happens to be British--there's just NO WAY the rest of her high school experience can be anything but some whacky (or generic) slice-of-life comedy, with a dash of melodrama and sorry attempts at "romance".

Or so she assumes, anyway."

Features:

  • Fully voice acted dialogue (English)
  • 36,000+ words
  • 11 original event CGs
  • 15 pseudo-endings
  • Unlockable extras
  • Random references
  • Playable heroine with a personality!
  • No DRM
  • IT'S COMPLETELY FREE!

Bonus SECTION! After you've played the game--

MEET THE CAST!

Part 1 (Director Interviews Cast)

Part 2 (Cast interviews Director)

Part 3 (In-Character Interview)

Walkthrough

Struggling getting on the route you want or reaching all the pseudo-ends? This guide will show you exactly what to do!

- Official Lemmasoft Guide -

Google Docs feedback survey!

Made a survey to collect some feedback on how you did or did not enjoy the game! It's anon, and if you'd like to take it, you can do so here; https://goo.gl/forms/Bs8NE65gzd6HA5Cr2

Recommended to take after you've gotten at least 1 end per route, most ideal if all~

Send me your fanarts!

Wanna show your love for the game and get your art featured in the Fanart Gallery for { First Quarter }'s update? Learn how to do so here!
